Say hello to Forekast, the “Calendar of the Internet.”

The Forekast Chrome Extension allows you to quickly see what big events are happening today, whether it's a sporting event, a rocket launch, a huge product debut, or a movie premiere.

It's great for any marketer, social media manager, business owner, or general human being who might want to know whats coming up so they can plan out their social or look like a genius in their next meeting.

Want more than just today's events? You can view the whole week ahead in our Chrome Extension when you sign up for a Forekast account, which also gives you full access to our website where you can view events going months and years in advance. 

There's a reason why marketing and social media professionals from brands like Audi, Hilton, Nintendo, Spotify and more are using Forekast; it works.

Whether you need a hand with creating social content throughout the year or you just want to stay on top of trends, Forekast is the way to go. We also integrate with Google, Apple, and Outlook so you can stay up-to-date without losing your workflow.

Never miss another post opportunity for you or your business again. 

Try the free Forekast extension out today and put it through the paces.
